title: Ukrainian military had 45 combat engagements with Russian forces near Bilohorivka of Luhansk region, Terny, Yampolivka, Rozdo...
content: Ukrainian military had 45 combat engagements with Russian forces near Bilohorivka of Luhansk region, Terny, Yampolivka, Rozdolivka and north to Vesele of Donetsk region, Klischiyivka of Donetsk region, Berdychi and Pervomayske of Donetsk region, Novomykhaylivka, Staromayorske of Donetsk region, south-west Bilohirya and north-west of Verbove of Zaporizhzhia region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
